gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Magic 104, Trail Blazers 103
gameRecap.excerpt: The Magic hang on and defeat the Trail Blazers, 104-103. Franz Wagner recorded 20 points and six rebounds for the Magic, with Wendell Carter Jr. adding 17 points, 13 rebounds, and five assists in the victory. Dalano Banton tallied 26 points, five rebounds, and five assists for the Trail Blazers in the defeat. The Magic improve to 44-31, while the Trail Blazers fall to 19-56.
